title: Muscle
description: A muscle is an anatomical structure consisting of a contractile form of tissue that animals use to effect movement.

bloodSupply.description: The blood vessel that carries blood from the heart to the muscle.

nerve.description: The underlying innervation associated with the muscle.

insertion.description: The place of attachment of a muscle, or what the muscle moves.

antagonist.description: The muscle whose action counteracts the specified muscle.
